name: Corrupt The Priest
description: You are one of the many servants of the strife god, and your task is to possess the mind of the local archpriest in order to sow wickedness and discordance in the town.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core + Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB + DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: Any sound card capable of stereo output
